title._content: [Portrait of James P. (James Price) Johnson and Marty Marsala, Riverboat on the Hudson, N.Y., ca. July 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of James P. (James Price) Johnson and Marty Marsala, Riverboat on the Hudson, N.Y., ca. July 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 034 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Johnson, James P. (James Price), 1894-19 Marsala, Marty Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Pianists--1940-1950. Riverboat on the Hudson Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
